Direct Known Subclasses:

extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnStrategy

    void move​(Worker worker, java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> valid_positions, int index, Game game, Board board)
    Extracts the Coordinates from the array of valid positions and calls the moveWorker method from game.
    int turn​(Player player, Worker worker, Board board, Game game, int extraEffect, VirtualView vview)
    The standard flow of the turn: -Calculate the valid positions for the movement -Checks if the array is empty, if so the player has lost, if not it sends the array to the view -Receive the index of the chosen position and modifies the model with the movement -Checks if this was a winning move, if not it goes on and calculate the valid positions for the build -Sends the array to the view, and receive the index of the chosen build spot -Modify the model with del buildUp method

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public DefaultStrategy()

  • Method Details

    • turn

      public int turn​(Player player, Worker worker, Board board, Game game, int extraEffect, VirtualView vview)
      The standard flow of the turn: -Calculate the valid positions for the movement -Checks if the array is empty, if so the player has lost, if not it sends the array to the view -Receive the index of the chosen position and modifies the model with the movement -Checks if this was a winning move, if not it goes on and calculate the valid positions for the build -Sends the array to the view, and receive the index of the chosen build spot -Modify the model with del buildUp method
      Specified by:
      turn in interface TurnStrategy
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is playing this turn
      worker - the chosen worker
      board - the board
      game - the game
      extraEffect - applied on this turn

    • move

      public void move​(Worker worker, java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> valid_positions, int index, Game game, Board board)
      Extracts the Coordinates from the array of valid positions and calls the moveWorker method from game.
      Specified by:
      move in interface TurnStrategy
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker that is moving
      valid_positions - the arraylist of valid positions
      index - the index of the position that the player has choosen
      game - the game
      board - the board

    • checkAvailableMoveSpots

      public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> checkAvailableMoveSpots​(Player player, Worker worker, Board board, boolean athenaeffect)
      Checks the 3x3 matrix around the worker to determine in which the worker can move.
      Specified by:
      checkAvailableMoveSpots in interface TurnStrategy
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      worker - the worker that is moving
      board - board
      athenaeffect - the athena effect restriction, if true the worker cant move in higher cells
      Returns:
      an Arraylist with all the Cooordinates of the spots in which the worker can move

    • checkAvailableBuildSpots

      public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> checkAvailableBuildSpots​(Player player, Worker worker, Board board)
      Checks the 3x3 matrix around the worker to determine in which the worker can build.
      Specified by:
      checkAvailableBuildSpots in interface TurnStrategy
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      worker - the worker that is building
      board - board
      Returns:
      an Arraylist with all the Cooordinates of the spots in which the worker can build

    • checkWinCondition

      public boolean checkWinCondition​(Coordinates starting_position, Coordinates final_position, Board board)
      Method that checks if the player has won after a move. It checks if the starting position has an height value of "2" and if the final position has an height value of "3". To be executed after every move.
      Specified by:
      checkWinCondition in interface TurnStrategy
      Parameters:
      starting_position - the position before the move
      final_position - the position after the move
      board - board
      Returns:
      true if the player has won
